inclusion.criterion: adult patients who underwent any type of bariatric surgery at Tawam Hospital with at least 12 months duration post-operative
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Not willing to participate in the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 57-year-old man with Wegener's granulomatosis, being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. His last physical exam and lab study showed normal results.
